ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard Revenge?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think it s the player so much as a lot of brand new players haven t shaken the single-player mode syndrome yet. You ll find this a lot in crush - they
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think it's the player so much as a lot of brand new players haven't
shaken the single-player mode syndrome yet. You'll find this a lot in crush
- they are still convinced they can solo, they are still convinced
cooperation isn't necessary, they are still convinced it's a 'competition'
with other players.

Once they get past the CB levels, most of them grow a clue.



>Maybe it's just me but every time I visit the eleven continent I experience
>similar situations. Maybe something about dwarves and elves attract a
younger,
>more immature gamer. So I spend most of my time elsewhere despite the great
>dungeons there. Still have the occasional KS problems but nowhere near
as bad
>as near The Fay.
